maqras.text: 37|22|Fugi o okonatte ita-sha-tachi, sono tsuma-tachi, mata kare-ra ga arra o sashioite hai shite ita mono-tachi o atsume nasai.
37|23|Kare-ra o hi goku e no michi ni tsurete ike.
37|24|Iya, kare-ra o mata sete oke. Kare-ra ni tazuneru koto ga aru.
37|25|Anata gata ga tasukeawanai no wa do shita koto ka.'
37|26|Iya, kyo bakari wa, kare-ra mo (shinpan ni) fuku suru.
37|27|Kare-ra wa tagaini chikadzuki tazune au.
37|28|Ippo wa iu. `Hontoni anata gata wa, migi kara kimashita.'
37|29|Suruto taho wa iu. `Iya, anata gata wa,(motomoto) shinjade wa arimasendeshita.
37|30|Mata, watashi-tachi wa anata gata ni oshitsukeru ken'i mo arimasendeshita. Soreni anata gata wa hangyaku no todeshita.
37|31|Sore de omo no o kotoba ga, watashi-tachi ni jissho sa reta ima, watashi-tachi wa,(chobatsu o) ajiwawaneba naranai.
37|32|Watashi-tachi wa anata gata o mayowa setaga, watashi-tachi jishin mo mayotte ita nodesu.'
37|33|Koshite sonohi, kare-ra wa,(subete) tomoni chobatsu o ukeru.
37|34|Hontoni ware wa kono yo ni tsumi o okashita mono o jobunsuru.
37|35|Kare-ra wa,`arra no soto ni kami wa arimasen.' To tsuge rareru to, itsumo koman ni natta.
37|36|Soshite,`kichigai shijin no tame ni, watashi-tachi no kamigami o sutete naru monodesu ka.' To itte ita.
37|37|Iya, kare wa shinri o motarashite,(kare izen no) yogen-sha-tachi (no Keisuke) o kakusho suru monodearu.
37|38|Anata gata wa, kanarazu itamashi chobatsu o ajiwaudearou.
37|39|Dose mina anata gataga okonatta koto no mukuidearu.
37|40|Daga arra no chuseina shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu.
37|41|Sorera no mono ni wa, sadame no onkei ga ari,
37|42|(yorokobashi) kajitsu, soshite eiyo ga (sadzuke rare),
37|43|shifuku no rakuen no naka de,
37|44|nedoko no ue de mukaiau.
37|45|Kiyoi izumi kara kunda hai wa, kare-ra ni yukiwatari,
37|46|mashiro (na bishu wa), nomu mono ni kokochiyoi ama-sa.
37|47|Kore wa, zutsu o moyosazu, yowa se mo shinai.
37|48|Mata kare-ra no soba ni wa, fushime-gachina oki me (no otome) ga iru.
37|49|Ka no on'na-ra wa, chuibukaku mamora rete iru tamago no yo.
37|50|Yagate kare-ra wa, tagaini chikadzuki tazune au.
37|51|Kare-ra no hitori ga, kuchi o kitte iu. `Watashi ni hitori no shitashi tomo ga imashita.
37|52|Kare wa itte ita. “Anata made (fukkatsu no hi o) shinjite iru nodesu ka.
37|53|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara, hontoni shinpan sa reru nodeshou ka.”'
37|54|Mata itta. `Ma minasan mioroshite mi nasai.'
37|55|Sokode kare ga miorosu to, hi goku no tadanaka ni kare no sugata ga mieta.
37|56|Kare wa itta. `Arra ni kakete, anata wa mosukoshi de watashi o hametsu sa seru tokorodeshita.
37|57|Moshi omo no onmegumi ga nakattanaraba, watashi wa kanarazu hikitate rareru mono no naka ni itadeshou.'
37|58|`Watashi-tachi (rakuen no nakama) wa, saisho no shi dakede mata,
37|59|shinu koto wa nai nodesu ka. Mata, watashi-tachi ga, chobatsu o ukeru koto wa nai nodeshou ka.'
37|60|`-Sodearunara kore wa, shijo no kofuku no jojudesu.
37|61|Kono yona koto no tame ni, kodo shi doryoku subekidesu.'
37|62|Sore wa kekkona kantaide wanai ka. Soretomo zakkumu no ki (o toru no) ka.
37|63|Ware wa kono ki o fugi o okonau mono e no kokoromi to shite, yoi shita nodearu.
37|64|Sore wa jigoku no soko ni haeru ki de,
37|65|sono jitsuwa, akuma no atama no yodearu.
37|66|Kare-ra wa kore o tabete, hara wa sore de ibbai.
37|67|Sore kara ue ni futto suru yu o sosogi tasa re,
37|68|sorekara hi goku ni kaeri tsuku nodearu.
37|69|Kare-ra wa sosen no mayotte ita no o mitomenagara mo,
37|70|sono ashiato o isoide (aruite) ita nodearu.
37|71|Mukashi no oku no sosen-tachi mo, tashika ni mayotte ita.
37|72|Daga ware wa kare-ra ni, kanarazu keikoku-sha o noko wa shita.
37|73|Miruga i. Keikoku sa rete mo mushi shita mono no saigo ga, dodeatta ka o.
37|74|(Daga) arra no chuseina shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu.
37|75|Katsute nufu wa ware ni aigan shita. Ware wa mottomo sugureta oto-shadearu.
37|76|Ware wa, kare to sono kazoku o dainan kara sukutta.
37|77|Soshite kare no shison o ikinokora seta.
37|78|Mata ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare no tame ni (shukufuku no kotoba o) tometa.
37|79|`Banbutsu (ningen, tenshi, Jin) no naka de tokuni nufu no ue ni heian'are.' To (ware kara no arigatai o kotoba o).
37|80|Ware wa kono yo ni, tadashi okonai no mono ni mukuiru.
37|81|Hontoni kare wa, shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta.
37|82|Sorekara ware wa sono soto no mono o, obore saseta.
